{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16808v1", "title": "Desingularization of double covers of regular surfaces", "summary": "Let $Z$ be a noetherian integral excellent regular scheme of dimension $2$.
Let $Y$ be an integral normal scheme endowed with a finite flat morphism $Y\to
Z$ of degree $2$. We give a description of Lipman's desingularization of $Y$ by
explicit equations, leading to a desingularization algorithm for $Y$.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-23T15:26:52Z"}
